title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 573.3 - Denial of application for or limitation of initial operating certificate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 573.3 - Denial of application for or limitation of initial operating certificate

State Regulations

The commissioner shall not deny any application or limit any
initial operating certificate without giving the applicant an opportunity to be
heard in accordance with Part 503 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
573.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
